channel_description: Ash’s Kalos region adventure reaches its exciting conclusion in Pokémon the Series: XYZ, now on Pokémon TV!

media.description: Bonnie makes a new friend, Ash runs into an old friend, and a terrifying premonition begins to unfold!
media.title: From A to Z!

media.description: While Eevee deals with some unwanted attention, Team Rocket turns its attention to Squishy!
media.title: Love Strikes! Eevee, Yikes!

media.description: There’s trouble at the local Pokémon Center, but our heroes and Professor Sycamore are there to help!
media.title: A Giga Battle with Mega Results!

media.description: As our heroes continue their journey to Snowbelle City, they encounter a young Pokémon faced with the challenges of growing up!
media.title: A Fiery Rite of Passage!

media.description: A nighttime campout brings some interesting adventures for our heroes’ Pokémon!
media.title: Dream a Little Dream from Me!

media.description: Ash’s friend Sanpei is showing our heroes around his home in Ninja Village, but this peaceful place will soon be threatened!
media.title: The Legend of the Ninja Hero!

media.description: On the eve of the village festival, the fate of Ninja Village hangs in the balance!
media.title: A Festival of Decisions!

media.description: Our heroes are in Couriway Town for Serena’s next Pokémon Showcase, and her third Princess Key win is at stake!
media.title: A Dancing Debut!

media.description: Our heroes are visiting Terminus Cave with hopes of seeing new Pokémon, but they're not alone!
media.title: Meeting at Terminus Cave!

media.description: A courageous rescue during our heroes’ search for Squishy leaves one of their friends in danger!
media.title: A Cellular Connection!

media.description: An expansive field of flowers provides our heroes with a beautiful setting to witness a blooming friendship!
media.title: A Windswept Encounter!

media.description: Serena is invited to a dance party for Pokémon performers, and there are many surprises in store!
media.title: Party Dancecapades!

media.description: A fierce battle between two powerful Pokémon is about much more than just who wins!
media.title: A Meeting of Two Journeys!

media.description: As Team Flare continues to advance Operation Z, they get help from an unexpected source!
media.title: An Explosive Operation!

media.description: Traversing a vast expanse of parched land, our heroes discover a small group of dedicated individuals in need!
media.title: A Watershed Moment!

media.description: It’s Pokémon Showcase time for Serena, and winning her third Princess Key is on the line!
media.title: Master Class Choices!

media.description: Our heroes are about to take part in an exciting celebration, but the guest of honor is not happy!
media.title: An Electrifying Rage!

media.description: Our heroes plan to visit a gem exhibition—but they run into a mystery instead!
media.title: Unlocking Some Respect!

media.description: The Pokémon Showcase Master Class is under way, and Serena is competing with friends and rivals galore!
media.title: Master Class Is in Session!

media.description: The Pokémon Showcase Master Class is in full swing, and Serena’s quest to become Kalos Queen is shifting into high gear!
media.title: Performing a Pathway to the Future!

media.description: Bonnie has been looking for someone to take care of her big brother...but what will happen when she finds that someone?
media.title: A Keeper for Keeps?

media.description: While Ash battles a fever, another Trainer comes along to challenge him to a Pokémon battle!
media.title: Battling at Full Volume!

media.description: Ash and Greninja have displayed some amazing and mysterious traits in battle, and Clemont wants to find out why!
media.title: The Synchronicity Test!

media.description: Team Rocket is still after Pikachu, but a shy, rare Pokémon is getting in their way!
media.title: Making Friends and Influencing Villains!

media.description: Ash wants to learn more about what happens when he and Greninja merge during battle, and the Champion Diantha is the right person to help!
media.title: Championing a Research Battle!

media.description: During our heroes’ final leg of their journey to Snowbelle City, a chance meeting with an old friend and rival gives Ash a surprising battle opportunity!
media.title: A Full-Strength Battle Surprise!

media.description: The time for Ash’s Snowbelle City Gym battle is here, and his eighth Gym badge hangs in the balance!
media.title: All Hail the Ice Battlefield!

media.description: Following Ash’s defeat at the Snowbelle Gym, some not-so-quiet introspection turns into some real inspiration!
media.title: Seeing the Forest for the Trees!

media.description: Ash is back at the Snowbelle City Gym for a rematch, but will Gym Leader Wulfric feel the heat?
media.title: A Real Icebreaker!

media.description: A visit to a friend confronts our heroes with a most unusual group of challenges!
media.title: A Diamond in the Rough!

media.description: Clemont has invited the rest of our heroes to experience one of his true passions, while a certain group of uninvited guests are along for the ride!
media.title: A Gaggle of Gadget Greatness!

media.description: The Kalos League is just getting under way, and the battle temperature is already turned way up!
media.title: A League of His Own!

media.description: The Kalos League rages on toward the semifinals, and the red-hot battling never ceases to excite and amaze!
media.title: Valuable Experience for All!

media.description: The semifinals of the Kalos League have arrived, bringing two intense battles!
media.title: Analysis Versus Passion!

media.description: As the Kalos League semifinal round continues between Ash and Sawyer, the audience witnesses a rivalry few have ever experienced!
media.title: A Riveting Rivalry!

media.description: The final round of the Kalos League is about to get under way, and there’s a lot going on behind the scenes!
media.title: Kalos League Passion with a Certain Flare!

media.description: It’s time for the Kalos League finals, and it’s Ash versus Alain in their much-anticipated battle!
media.title: Finals Not for the Faint-Hearted!

media.description: The final round of the Kalos League is in high gear, and surprises are in abundance: from the first second to the very last!
media.title: Down to the Fiery Finish!

media.description: Lysandre and Team Flare are attempting to take over Lumiose City and the world, and our heroes are in the middle of the chaos!
media.title: A Towering Takeover!

media.description: Lumiose City is on the verge of ruin, but our heroes and their friends are not about to stand by and do nothing!
media.title: Coming Apart at the Dreams!

media.description: The fate of Kalos and the world depends on the outcome of Team Flare’s plans, and our heroes are doing their best to stop them!
media.title: The Right Hero for the Right Job!

media.description: The fate of Chespie and the world rests in the hands of an extraordinarily powerful group of friends and allies!
media.title: Rocking Kalos Defenses!

media.description: The moment of truth has arrived, as our heroes and their friends must face the final challenge that will decide the fate of the world!
media.title: Forming a More Perfect Union!

media.description: The Lumiose City Gym is still being repaired, but a battle challenge from a young Trainer is just the thing to get everyone and everything up and running!
media.title: Battling with a Clean Slate!

media.description: Our heroes are busy planning their futures, but one is having more trouble planning than the others!
media.title: The First Day of the Rest of Your Life!

media.description: As our heroes prepare to go their separate ways, they face the return of a danger that wasn’t quite defeated!
media.title: Facing the Needs of the Many!

media.description: Our heroes are going their separate ways, and it’s time for goodbyes, fond memories, and eyes to the future!
media.title: Till We Compete Again!

media.description: A trip to some newly discovered ruins in Kalos reveals a rich history of compassion and caring from three Legendary Pokémon!
media.title: The Legend of X, Y, and Z!
